long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Generate AI documentation of any Web3 contract

Bunzz Decipher allows you to generate “AI” documentation for any Web3 contract on some of the most popular block explorers.

Generate Documentation -> Download & edit code in Local IDE via Bunzz CLI -> Deploy code with Metamask via BunzzCLI

 • Decipher supports 9 chains and their testnets:
 • Ethereum – Etherscan
 • Binance Smart chain – Bscscan
 • Polygon – Polygonscan
 • Arbitrum – Arbiscan
 • Avalanche – Snowtrace
 • Optimism – Optimism scan
 • Moonbeam & Moonriver – Moonscan
 • Fantom - Ftmscan

How to use:
1. Download and install the Chrome Extension.
2. Go to your favorite block explorer and go to any contract.
3. The Bunzz Decipher extension will show a floating button on that contract page.
4. Click the button to generate documentation for that contract

About Bunzz:
Bunzz is a smart contract hub built for developers by developers where you can find any contract in the web3 ecosystem. You can add your specific contracts which can be used by other dapp developers or use any of the pre-existing contracts to deploy to any EVM chain of your choice.
